text: Homayoun Behzadi (; 20 June 1942 â€“ 22 January 2016) was an Iranian footballer and coach. He usually played as a striker. He played for Paykan, but most notably for the Iran national football team. For a very brief time, Behzadi was the coach of the Persepolis football team in 1975. Behzadi suffered a heart attack in April 2013. He made a full recovery. Behzadi died in Tehran on 22 January 2016 at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== *Homayoun Behzadi at TeamMelli.com *Interview with Homayoun Behzadi Category:1942 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Iranian footballers Category:Iranian football managers
title: Homayoun Behzadi
